sys_ui_message.key: Wait for condition step causes the flow to wait until the record matches the specified condition. Use this activity to block the flow indefinitely until a particular condition is met. You must populate the condition field.
sys_ui_message.message: Wait for condition step causes the flow to wait until the record matches the specified condition. Use this activity to block the flow indefinitely until a particular condition is met. You must populate the condition field.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Wait for condition step causes the flow to wait until the record matches the specified condition. Use this activity to block the flow indefinitely until a particular condition is met. You must populate the condition field.
